root.name: myNotebook: Pearl
root.description: Features Take notes wherever you go.Make a list and cross it off.Personalize your notebook by drawing on the cover and changing the paper type with 24 unlockable paper styles.Use a pen or pencil to make your notes or doodles and then erase the bits you don't like.Five ink colours.Write up to 128 pages (hard limit) of notes in this virtual notebook.Lined, squared and blank paper types.The time, battery status and volume level are displayed on screen at all times.12 unlockable lined and 12 unlockable squared paper styles.Export pages to your DSi camera album.This one has Squirtle.Experience a level of fun and excitement comparable to spending $5 on a real notebook.
